tool_description: This is a powerful Real time book data retrival API that fetches the top books for NY times with book Title, Image, Description, Author, Publisher, Amazon Url, Isbn and Book rank. You can use it to build your projects like a book store and much more.
name: All Books Api
title: All Books Api

api_list.name: Get all Books Data
api_list.description: This end point will return back all Books data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com/getBooks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com/getBooks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get book by ISBN
api_list.description:
/isbn/{isbn} replace the {isbn} with isbn number of a book and you will GET the response with all the information regarding that book.

example - /isbn/1250178630
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com/isbn/1250178630"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com/isbn/{isbn}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Book by title
api_list.description:
This will GET all books by title. The title should be in caps

example - /title/FOURTH WING
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com/title/FOURTH WING"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com/title/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-books-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
